title: Player Feedback
description: Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on Planes of Tlessa! Your input will help me, The Creator - make a better game for everyone involved. This survey is geared towards new players starting out, but everyone and all feedback is welcome!

sections.title: General Game Play
sections.description: I want to understand your overall experience with the game play, including how you find the learning curve and general enjoyment.

input_types.label: How would you rate your overall experience with the game play?
If you selected "Poor," please explain why (Optional):
How challenging did you find the learning curve?
If you selected "Too hard," please explain why (Optional):
Which aspects of the game play do you enjoy the most? (Select all that apply)
If you selected "Other" in the previous question, please specify (Optional):
How satisfied are you with the variety of content in the game?
If you selected "Dissatisfied" or "Very dissatisfied," please explain why (Optional):

sections.title: Guide Quests
sections.description: I am interested in your experience with the Guide Quests. Do they make sense, and are they helpful?

input_types.label: Are the guide quests clear and easy to follow?
If you selected "No," please explain why (Optional):
How satisfied are you with the rewards from guide quests?
If you selected "Dissatisfied" or "Very dissatisfied," please explain why (Optional):
How helpful did you find the guide quests overall?
If you selected "Unhelpful," please explain why (Optional):

sections.title: Crafting & Enchanting
sections.description: You might be new, and you might not have touched much of these systems with what you have gotten from the shop and or drops. But I am still curious about your feedback for these two systems. Is it intuitive, and do you understand how it works?

input_types.label: How intuitive do you find the crafting system?
If you selected "Confusing" or "Very confusing," please explain why and how we can make the crafting system better (Optional):
How intuitive do you find the enchanting system?
If you selected "Confusing" or "Very confusing," please explain why and how we can make the enchanting system better (Optional):
Has the Guide Quests helped you at all in your crafting/enchanting journeys?
If you said "No", please explain why (Optional):

sections.title: UI of the Game
sections.description: In this section I want to understand your experience as a new player or returning player with the UI of the game it's self.

input_types.label: Which platform do you play on the most?
Are links and buttons and tabs clear to you?
Do you understand how to fight a monster?
Do you understand how to revive when you are killed?
Do you understand how to craft or enchant items?
Do you understand how to move around the map [Desktop]
Do you understand how to move around the map [Mobile]
If you use a screen reader is the game easy to navigate regardless of platform
options: I do not use a screen reader

input_types.label: How do you find the accessibility of the game?
Do you have any other UI Feedback to help Tlessa improve? (Optional)

sections.title: Final Thoughts
sections.description: Thank you so much for taking the time to fill out this survey. Your feedback is invaluable to Tlessa in my efforts to make this the best PBBG out there. I just have a couple final questions for you before giving you that shiny Mythic!

input_types.label: Would you recommend this game to your friends?
How did you hear about Tlessa?
If you selected other can you tell me where you heard about Tlessa? (Optional)
Final thoughts? Anything you wish to let me know that wasn't covered here? (Optional)
